content:
Scenario: Teacher documents personal spending on classroom supplies
    Given teachers spend personal money on student supplies
    And administration doesn't acknowledge this burden
    When teachers track personal spending through Observer
    Then district-wide data shows teachers spend average $600 annually
    And spending patterns reveal systematic resource inadequacy
    And teachers document impact on lower-income teachers
    And advocate for adequate classroom budgets as equity issue
    And working conditions transparency exposes hidden subsidies teachers provide
